website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, high-quality salt lamp constructed with attention to detail that will add beauty to your home.
pros: We love its attractive aesthetic, soothing glow, and high-level design
Some users also attested to its holistic health benefits, citing it as beneficial for sinus problems and insomnia
cons: A few users had difficulty with the dimmer switch

customer_reviews.title: Levoit is my #1 go-to for salt lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Aurora lamp (largest size with silve base). This is hands down the highest quality salt lamp I have owned! Great coloring. The base is very nice and it doesn't damage the surface it sits on. The packaging was great and my product arrived with no damage or issues. The dimmer is easy to operate once you know how to use it. I just purchased a second lamp to give to a friend as a housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Everyone With Allergies Needs This!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is really big and beautiful and I the light dimmer is easy to use, but that's not why I bought it. I have horrible allergies and I was hoping this would help reduce my sneezing in my bedroom. I live in Hawaii and the pollen here is high all year round. I've used all sorts of allergy medicines and nothing helps completely but since Ive had this in my bedroom my suffering has ended. For the first week I kept thinking why did I take so long getting this. Oh well better late than never. Don't hesitate getting this lamp, it works and its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L. R.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The product came in good condition and very nicely packaged. After several months, my lamp quit working. Levoit customer service personnel are very friendly but non responsive. Everything they promised to do from returning my calls (at least 10 of them) to replacing my lamp they did not do. I'm left with a hunk of salt, a pretty one, but a very expensive hunk of salt.
customer_reviews.author: THM

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Just like anything else, you get what you pay for, and sometimes you even got more... Levoit product and customer service is one of them. Products design, packaging and functionality is awesome. To make it even better, their customer service is outstanding on followups and reminders. I wish more companies were like this. ..Ben
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hayat

customer_reviews.title: Came in a great packaging and the Salt Crystal itself is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I just received my salt lamp today. Came in a great packaging and the Salt Crystal itself is beautiful. You can tell it's authentic. I also love the metallic base and the white cords, which was one of my must-have's since my furniture is white. The button is touch sensitive and the dimmer really works with the slightest touch. I usually never leave reviews here on Amazon, but this product really deserved a nice review. I'm definitely planning on buying another one of these. Just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Camila ZT

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service, product didn’t turn on upon arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this, tried turning it on and it doesn’t not turn on. It flashed once when I moved the cord a certain way .. the turned off right after. So technically all it’s done for us was blink once .. i reaches out to levoit and still no response ....
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great untl the light went out
customer_reviews.text: I was really enjoying this lamp. However, when the bulb went out, I was only able to unscrew 2 of the 4 screws and am therefore unable to replace the bulb. It appears these screws were stripped as the screwdriver would not catch as it did with the first two. Wish I could recommend, but the length of time I was able to use does not justify the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a salt lamp that doesn't look like it belongs in a college dorm! (no offense to college dorms meant.)
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lamps - They were very well packed (and the boxes looked like presents! lol). The lamps are easy to operate, they have a really nice dimmer, very thorough directions, extra lightbulb is included, and just look about ten times nicer than other salt lamps of this size that I've seen. Their warranty is also great. Well worth the cost - I'll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: TheMarv

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I had this lamp for six months, it doesnt even turn on now. I also had alot of problems with the switch. Had trouble dimming it. I do not even see anywhere to replace the bulb if that is even the problem. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Anna P.

customer_reviews.title: Make us sick
customer_reviews.text: We loved this lamp. Good packing, top quality, but it make us sick when we operat it. It works for some people, but not others.I tried the "Free returns" . It was $15 shipping, so I will sell it at a garage sale. I wish it did not bother us. Updae: We gave it to a friend, and it made her sic. She felt better when she returned it. The wife;s sister had the same experiance. I have heard of other people with the same experiance with salt lamps. I have never personly had anyone tell me that it improved their health.
customer_reviews.author: F. DuMars

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I purchased 5 for myself an family. We all love them. I did purchase 15 watt bulbs for the 3 I kept for myself. Makes them a little bit brighter and warmer. Hint: When you change the bulbs, take a marker and mark where the base meets the salt. Then when you put them back together screws and base match up. I learned my lesson on the first one I changed over.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, BROKE AFTER A FEW WEEKS OF USE
customer_reviews.text: If i could give it ZERO stars I would. It broke after only a few weeks of using. It made a “sizzle” noise then just went dark. It was not the bulb....we did change the bulb, twice. It is way too heavy to even bother trying to send it back. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for Christmas. One for my mother as a gift and one for our home. Unfortunately, the glass inside the rock lamp was shattered when I opened the box. So, I took apart the base to replace the bulb(took some work compared to others that don't have screws). Replaced the light and plugged it back in... DEAD unit. It's a shame. We've purchased many salt rock lamps and never had this issue. Calling levoit CS now to try to get it replaced. Just not sure if I can recommend since I can't tell if it actually works.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of any kind of salt lamp. I read a lot of the reviews on several different companies of salt lamps and it seems the negative reviews is a common one for salt lamps. One particular is that the salt lamps arrived chipped, broken, or in pieces. I has very happy to see the packaging was very high quality to ensure it wasn't damaged. I was happy to see that it wasn't! Beautiful size and shape. Some other negative reviews said the salt lamps melted or started to mold? I would look into your home conditions if so.... because i've had no issues or signs of melting or color change. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and just bright enough. 2 years later,  still on the same bulb after using nightly.
customer_reviews.text: I love the dimmer switch. The presentation of the lamp is also very nice. Sturdy gift box with a nice picture and silky handles. Very classy. The glow is very soothing and it makes a great night light. No complaints at all and ours literally runs almost 24/7. My partner works days and I work thirds. It gives off a very soothing glow. I have blackout curtains, so this gives me the illusion of a nightlight even during the daytime hours. I also love the natural cut of the salt and they are true to the weight depicted. I have already purchased the nightlight size as well as the grey version for other rooms. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rugbychic216

customer_reviews.title: Soothing to look at
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I can actually 'feel' any difference but it adds to a sense of tranquility in the space. One thing I'll recommend is that you thoroughly inspect it before you do anything else. I glanced at mine, I let it run in one area of the room and decided it was too close to my bed regarding the low light at night and moved it across the room and with the location of the plug, I turned the lamp around and there was a crack near the bottom that I didn't notice when I first got it. I have no idea when that happened. :-/
customer_reviews.author: no1princefan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my in-laws last Christmas. Everything turned out well, the lamp was a beautiful size and emitted a very warm light. However, after two months the light stopped working. They switched the bulbs and... nothing. They decided the lamp itself was nice to look at and decided to keep it as is. Unfortunately, the lamp “sweats” quite a lot in humidity. Having the light would potentially lessen the sweating, but with the light being broken, this thoughtful gift turned into a dud. A grossly leaking, unlit paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Millions  of years old, pure and beautiful. Soothing. TASTY!!
customer_reviews.text: Our first lamp showed up with a broken on/ off switch due to gorilla shipping TYPICAL today, ( and the approx 10 lb. Weight of the salt crystal to be fair ) but the seller and Amazon immediately sent a perfect replacement ( thank you both ) and my wife has it in her sewing room and LOVES it and the beautiful glow it produces. This salt is great on popcorn, or as a lamp! It's a multi tasking million year old incredibly pure product that's beautiful and tasty. Just don't use the lamp for seasoning. It crushes the popcorn to pulp!! ( a very very little joke ) Do the Himalayan monks have one of these??
customer_reviews.author: Robert (Smokey) Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't this product have safety information in the documentation?
customer_reviews.text: I sent a query to the product distribution company and asked why doesn't this product have safety information in the documentation? They told me that it was because it was not purchased from the manufacture direct. I like the product and will keep it but it is my belief that the manufacture should certify the product and post this information in the product documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dimmer, lovely color
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a baby nightlight, with the possible added bonus of improved health. The dimmer switch is perfect for this— it ranges from soft enough for my husband to sleep through night feedings, but just bright enough to change a dirty diaper. The dimmer switch defaults to the last setting used, which I also love. I got a very pretty deep orange colored hunk of salt. Comes packed in a nice, extremely sturdy box (inside the amazon box), and all set up and includes two replacement lights. In all, I like this one MUCH better than the $30 I got at Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: Bratincevics

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I bought 3 all together, I bought two with the wooden base and this one. I sleep with one as a nightlight, one in my living room and one in my kitchen. I love the look of them. Just something about them, I don’t know what it is...wish I had 3 more! What a great gift for someone, but I bought them for myself... I may buy for someone later on. They come beautifully boxed too! Only thing.., I’m not crazy about the on/off/ dim switches but I can live with it because I never mess with it. Set it and forget it, unless the power goes out and I have to turn them back on!
customer_reviews.author: d nelson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and bummed:(
customer_reviews.text: Well to start out I was really excited about getting this! Then when it arrived the box was all broken and taped up, so I open the box and pulled out the Salt lamp, thought it looked a little small:( I ordered the 10 lb. salt lamp and this one isn’t even 8:( (see in pictures) so I returned that one, got the replacement today, it is also small and not a 10 lb. like the ordering area choices you choose:( it is also NOT even 8 lbs.) Both lamps received were 7.8 lbs :( VERY DISAPPOINTED when it was supposed to be 10 lbs. in the ordering section and on the page it specifies 8-11 lbs. :( BUMMED:( :(
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer8

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: When I first plugged in my lamp, the bulb exploded and I could hear loose glass in the lamp. After unscreewing the base - sure enough - the bulb was shattered. Thankfully it comes with 2 replacement bulbs. I don't know if this was the manufacturer's fault, or if it was the delivery person's. Either way, I can't give this product 5 stars because the shipping package doesn't say "fragile" on it anywhere, so there's nothing keeping a delivery person from throwing it onto your porch and potentially breaking something inside.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: they are warm and comforting and good to breathe
customer_reviews.text: Salt lamps always give an inviting atmosphere, they are warm and comforting and good to breathe. There are a LOT of these lamps to choose from many other sellers, but I Trust this company because they have made sure the wiring is properly correct by an electrician. I've heard that other salt lamps can be unsafe and possible fire -because the wiring wasn't correct. It is vital you buy a salt lamp from someone who has taken the time to make sure it's safe. Read the details they list, to see this one is good. Also, it arrives in a nice quality gift box, with extra bulbs, the lamp itself is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Helped me with my allergies
customer_reviews.text: I had been having issues with my allergies the day that this arrived. After coming home from an appointment, I saw the package was delivered & unboxed it. I plugged it in and had it turned it on while I was watching tv. About 3 hours later, I noticed my allergy issues disappeared! Also the overall appearance of the light with the metal base is attractive and relaxing. I wound up putting it in my bedroom, and I’m thinking about buying the larger size one for my family room. I’m pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: ck123

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these for our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I'm a chronic insomniac, so I do everything I can to keep the lights dim once the sun goes down and these lamps have made SUCH a difference in the quality of sleep I get. They are so soothing and I love the pink light (as a lifelong fan of pink). If you love soft lighting or just like the idea of the salt ions, these are a really great and affordable purchase. I got my first one as a gift and loved it so much I had to buy a second one for our other nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: e_whospends_money

customer_reviews.title: A+++++
customer_reviews.text: I love,love,love my salt lamps. The delivery was really fast. The packaging very secure. Not a wiggle or a jiggle. What can I say about the box? Wow, simply luxurious. The lamps were perfect and when plugged in they lit up instantly. Each lamp is individual, no two the same. One of mine has a soft calming light while the other is redder. They are stunning. I am going to order a couple more. I understand that they come in three sizes. I would like to order a couple of smaller ones but I don't see that choice offered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Sagewoman 42felliott

customer_reviews.title: Too Messy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ambience of this lamp but I have to say, I didn't realize they create such a mess. The salt has melted all down over my end table. I put a paper towel under the lamp & set it on a coaster & it still melts down through the paper towel. Very disappointed. Boxing up & placing in storage. Too much of a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but 1st bulb only lasted 1 month
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. I like it. I've had it for slightly over a month now. I keep it lit continuously. Today it was off and wouldn't turn on. I laboriously opened it up to change out the bulb. The old bulb doesn't look burned out, but the new bulb works. I really hope this doesn't go through a bulb a month. (744 hours) when the bulbs are supposedly rated for 3000 hours (according to the $10/6-pack replacements that I am now ordering). I must say though, it would be much nicer if the entire outer base could screw on/off the inner base instead of being held on by all those screws.
customer_reviews.author: egburr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 11-15 pounder. Came in at 13.8 pounds. Really beautiful lamp. Came with 2 extra bulbs in a really pretty package. The stainless base adds a nice element from the wood base lamps. The cord does take a minute to figure out but once you get it, there is no issue. Love the dimming capability and the feeling that this cord won't melt like other competitor lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Fifty Toes

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. It is small and i have bought other salt lamps and the are the same weight but they were less money. Dont see the same shape like on Amazon shows and the size and weight. I have 3 others and this was disappointing. Comes in a pretty fsncy box. But product not so pretty...
customer_reviews.author: d Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Best salt lamp I’ve ever purchased. Really high quality compared to others. The metal base and touch control really elevate this lamp. It even comes with extra bulbs and is boxed beautifully!!! This would make a fantastic gift for yourself or anyone!!! I have salt lamps in my kids’ rooms as a night light and they like them turned up bright. It helps them sleep so much better. They aren’t scared of the dark and the warm soft glow doesn’t keep them awake. I’m planning on buying this exact lamp again because I love it that much.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged for gift giving. The box, due to product weight, comes with strong ribbon handles. Included is an extra bulb tucked into the styrofoam top which holds the lamp steady. Just remove, plug in, and turn on. My time sleeping has increased 2-3 hours which for an insomniac is astounding. The touch switch allows for change in brightness and I found its soft light great for reading.
customer_reviews.author: nyrican4t-A-Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Like others said
customer_reviews.text: Got 1, had to have more, game changer for my small living room. Like others said, they are hit and miss, they heavy round ones are great, I received 2 losers, (tall thin underweight and clear unattractive salt). I shot an email to them about one of the losers and they immediately sent me another one. Customer service is great and that goes a long way with all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Switch is defective
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is beautiful when it works. The trouble is that it is very hard to get it to turn on. I have to stand there tapping the touch switch again and again over 30 seconds to a minute before it finally turns on. Sometimes it flashes on briefly then winks out again. I suspect some kind of short in the switch, which seems very badly designed. It is so hard to turn on, and getting worse each day, that it will discourage me from even trying eventually. So I have an orange rock paperweight with no light in it. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: belgarathmth

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Did my research first about the Himalayan Salt Lamp. Should be pricey and heavy. So this brand name was high on the list. It came beautifully packaged but the first thing I noticed was the weight. 8-11lbs is a nice size. The glow is stunning. From a night light to eliminating the room. Too soon to rate the Heath benefits but it makes me happy just looking at it. Planning on purchasing another for my bedroom as this one now sits in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jack93

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: First thoughts-amazing! Gorgeous color and the switch is so easy to use and a lot safer than my last one that was recalled for starting fires! Very well packaged and protected as well. Great box too that I'll have to find something to do with for sure. The base is sturdy and it come with two extra light bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: misseyunplugged

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp, well made.
customer_reviews.text: First one bought was very nice, cord was meaty, not flimsy like cheap lamps. Dimmer took awhile to figure out but works great. Size was good neat the high end of range. Color was nice. Liked it very much. So much ordered the double set and saved 10 dollars. Probably should have ordered seperately. One was just fine like other order, but second lamp was small and thinner, and color was almost white / clear. To lazy to return, so I've learned,no deal comes without a reason for giving the deal. Love the lamp. But should buy separately.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Different shape and color received than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is built well. However, the color we received was different looking than the one pictured. It was not horrible looking just different and the shape was a bit off as well. The lamp looks nice. This company should have better product quality review before sending them out.
customer_reviews.author: bes

customer_reviews.title: pretty good .... but
customer_reviews.text: i love salt lamps and this brand is an amazing place to buy one. but i had to order another one because the first one i ordered before was totally the wrong color and not bright enough. they were super nice and sent me another one but the one they sent me arrived broken. completely shattered. i have no idea what happened all the other ones arrived here in beautiful condition so i’m just not really sure. yes i would recommend this product but keep in mind there is a chance it will arrive broken or just not bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Does't work. :(
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Nothing happened when I plugged it in. There's something broken and rattling around inside the salt thing. There's also something rattling inside the switch. I do not have a screwdriver that will work for it right now, so I'll have to wait to see if I can fix it. Pretty rock though. Will update later if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: Fable

customer_reviews.title: Just super cool, great color.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I received one with great color in the crystal, its like mostly pinkish with orange mixed in. Looks awesome when lit, even on low. Switch a little tricky till you get used to it. Not sure about the Ion claims, as someone with an Engineering Degree, I do understand how it would affect dust particles in the air, if it does put out negatively charged particles. But I got it for the cool factor, and it is that, very heavy and tastes salty, (just one lick, not trying to get to the center, lol.). I really like this for a decorative bedside lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: So... disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Elora salt lamp I received today looks white and is off center on it's base. I had hoped Levoit would have better quality control. One would think a company wouldn't even want to sell a colorless salt lamp. I don't get a good feeling looking at this lamp, like I do with an orange salt lamp I have of a different brand. I see some people were lucky to receive a beautiful Levoit lamp. This one is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3-different Levoit Himalayan salt lamps. Elora, Elana & Aurora. They are all very well made and very attractive looking. I have no complaints nor any negative comments. It took less than a week for these lamps to help with my insomnia issues. My house also smells cleaner even though I have two dogs. I have no problem recommending these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Glita

customer_reviews.title: Well made Salt Lamp - great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my friend - she loves it. It is definitely heavy, comes well-packaged, and comes with everything pictured. It looks very well made. My friend swears her grandkids are calmer from having it on (she watches them regularly). In any case, I was so happy with this purchase that I bought another one for my sister. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Works at Home Some Days

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Beautiful Salt Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I must have been one of the Lucky ones, as I got a perfectly shaped, dark pink and orange 10 # stone, that gives off the most relaxing glow that makes my dojo look awesome. And with Levoit's superior electronics, it's very easy to turn on, increase the brightness, or dim, depending on your preference. Comes in a really nice Gift box.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Heller

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautifully Packaged and attention to details
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The packaging is exceptional making it the perfect gift box. Stainless steel base is nice. Dimmer function is nice. I have others with a wooden base that are cheaper. They work fine however there is an appreciation for the extra craftsmanship put forth here and having extra bulbs included is great. For me it's worth the $10 extra I have spent on this compared to the others I own. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this lamp until the dimmer control stopped working. It began acting up and then stayed on the brightest setting. Now you can turn it on, to the brightest,, or off and that is the extent of the settings. As others said it came beautifully packaged and would make an impressive gift if it would work for longer than 6 months. This was NOT a cheap lamp and I am highly disappointed that it is now malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: Texasirish

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp with Authentic Himalayan Salt Mined from Pakistan
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp and great to see it is made with authentic Himalayan salt. Legit Himalayan salt is mined from Pakistan and is the highest quality salt for lamps, cooking, cosmetic products, etc. The Pakistan salt gives off a deeper and brighter pink/orange hue than the knock offs. There are a lot of scams and misleading products on the market claiming to be real Himalayan salt but this lamp is solid. The lamp itself is perfect for a candle light effect. The dimmer feature is really great as well. Really relaxing light effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought a better, most expensive model (~$20) on Amazon, but the lamp is still smaller than I thought (about 6" by 7"). The very nice cord is as big as the lamp. I wondered if they maybe don't sell larger lamps because of weight and shipping? Also, the 'Elora' which was supposedly premium and nicely shaped, isn't anything special in form or shapeliness. The dimmer is very nice, because the max setting was a little too bright. Overall Levoit seems high quality. If I were going to give advice to a friend though, I would say pay more attention to the size you are getting, and try to comparison shop with other sales outlets if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquotte Fox

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful packaging, well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well. Arrived in perfect condition. Well made, multiple brightness settings. If all the good things attributed to salt lamps are true - it is too early to tell. But my husbands sneezing has stop. Coincidence?? Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mak2

customer_reviews.title: A very high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this lamp is excellent and when fully lighted emits a very nice orange glow, that fills a room. I haven't used the lamp long enough to derive all the benefits that the lamp is famous for but I am sure that I will as time goes by. That never happened. Levoit Elora customer service gave me a refund. Unfortunately, my air conditioning went out in 95 degree Florida and the house got very hot (92 degrees) and the lamp melted. There was salt all over the table that it sits on. I am not sure if they all do this but it was a problem I can't live with and I disposed of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax

customer_reviews.title: Ready for gifting!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, gift-giving package ready but this one is mine! Crystal has beautiful hues, lights and dims beautifully. Sits in our family room and stays lit 24/7 to allow for health benefits. I wasn't a believer but salt lamps have cleared my nasal passages. We now have several throughout the house but the Aurora from Levoit is one of the nicest.
customer_reviews.author: ceomom

customer_reviews.title: Bulb came shattered but good overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the larger and 2 smaller lamps all from this company based on the positive reviews from other amazon customers. Everything has worked good except for one large lamp. The bulb came shattered and the screws at the base were so tight, I had to use a screw gun to get them out. I replaced bulb with one of the extras and no trouble since. Both work amazing. They are real Salt - I licked them after I unbox ed to make sure they weren't fakes. I would still recommend this seller despite my issue with one because I think it was the mail handler being extraordinarily rough with the package.
customer_reviews.author: R. mt

customer_reviews.title: My Elora lamp has un ugly dark flaw - fault
customer_reviews.text: Trying to catch up with My reviews I must say I feel a little cheated with My latest purchase Elora H lamp. My previous purchase was a Aurora H Lamp and I am very happy with it the piece of rock is flawless so I order there at the second one for my guest bedroom that is smaller. As you can see in this picture it has a dark “fault” halfway which becomes very dark on the right side of the lamp. I know it’s a natural product but that description Clearly reads that they pick these rocks and make sure they are flawless or next to flawless. So I feel disappointed and cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Catwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best salt lamp on the market for insomnia
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Levoit salt lamp because of all the positive reviews. I wanted the best and I definitely received it. This lamp is fantastic! I keep it in my bedroom and gave itbon dim all night. Fir the first time I woke up refreshed and no stuffy nose! I have terrible allergies and insomnia. I slept the full 8 hours for the first time in a long time. If you are looking for a top rate Himalayan salt lamp, this the one. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly loving everything about my new salt lamp! I waited a while before finally making my decision and I am very pleased with my purchase. The weight, size, color, and shape is very pleasing to me. Nothing arrived broken or damaged, and it is very easy to operate. I really love the dimmable switch and they add two extra bulbs so thats pretty great as well!
customer_reviews.author: balisong

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the lamp is doesn't work. We purchased it in April and it stopped working so we put a new bulb in and it still doesn't work. I have no way of contacting the seller. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Broken bulb, beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: It’s sooooo beautiful! Great packaging and it looks so nice. Love the dimming feature. Only issue I had is when I got it the bulb inside was obliterated and while changing it I cut my finger. Ouch. Good thing the sent 2 more. That’s the only reason I’m taking a star.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this salt lamp. It is just beautiful and the one-touch on/off/dim feature is fabulous! I reached out to customer support with a question, and someone got back to me right away. Their customer service is amazing. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful salt lamp
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition exactly as described. Very beautiful salt lamp. This is my first salt lamp purchase, but I am happy with this one. Doesn't seem cheap or flimsy. Switch is easy to use. Love the dimmer option, but it's still a little too bright for me to use at night even on the lowest setting (I like a very dark room to sleep). But I love just turning it on when I get home from work and using it as a night light in my bedroom until bedtime. I don't think you'll be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany_RN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: The lamp arrived on time and in perfect condition. My initial impression was that this is a quality product and I definitely made the right choice. The lamp is beautiful and built with attention to detail. Even the packaging was first class. The lighting control is really nice with the easy touch on and off, and the glow at night is a nice night light for the room. Having never owned a salt lamp before, I will need to wait and see about any health related benefits, but I would definitely buy this just for the craftsmanship alone.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Brown

customer_reviews.title: Changing the light will require more patience than other models but won't be too bad. So far
customer_reviews.text: First thing noticed: the heft of the packaging. This thing arrived and there was no chance that it was going to be damaged. Update: Wanted to add an image of the box demonstrating its toughness. The actual crystal size is larger than my other lamps with a price that is similar to boot. Changing the light will require more patience than other models but won't be too bad. So far, I'm digging this and will definitely look to this company if I need another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Social_CB

customer_reviews.title: A great salt lamp in a fabulous gift box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my sister and she LOVED it. The lamp comes in a well protected box with ribbon handles that is very thick and sturdy. I literally just slapped on a bow on the box and gave it to her. This is a really high quality lamp with a stainless base. It has a nice dimmer switch too. The lamp comes with a couple replacement bulbs nestled in the packaging so don't accidentally toss them.
customer_reviews.author: MSP Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Levoit Salt Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Bought these salt lamps for wellness. I purchased 2...... one to put downstairs in the living room and one for upstairs in the bedroom. They are absolutely beautiful. They weigh about 10lbs. Nice size lamps for the price. They arrived perfect!! No damage whatsoever 👍🏼 I would highly recommend this brand.... Levoit...... and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp + the manufacturer takes care of their customers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second salt lamp from Levoit. When I have the funds I'll be getting at least a couple more. They go great on both my personal and my work desks. Lamp looks great too- love their design. The manufacturer is very customer service friendly and stand completely behind their product. When an issue arose with my original lamp- they contacted me immediately and fixed the problem- in a snap. I will definitely buy from them again. I've never had this good a customer service experience- ever.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: CONS: There aren't any instructions of how to replace the bulb. Also, you don't press the off/on switch, you simply tap it. Finally, it doesn't come with a screwdriver and the screws are very small. I hope I have time to find one before the bulb burns out. It says is for a space that's 10 sq ft. PROS: very heavy and other than the screws, seems will made.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best Lamp on the market
customer_reviews.text: The unboxing for this product is stellar. The lamp is firmly secured in a wonderful product branded box. The lamp is beautiful and brightens up any space. The cord was the selling feature for me, as we've owned a couple different salt lamps and they all had cord issues with overheating or malfunctioning. However, this Levoit cord with dimmer is by far a more Superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed but now Im happy
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year and the bulb has burned out... SOOOO DISAPPOINTED. I cannot figure out how to get the bottom open to change the bulb. So as much as I loved this .. 8 months is not good enough. EDITED - A bulb came with the lamp and I finally figured out how to open it and it works... and I do love the lamp..
customer_reviews.author: Donna K. Urban

customer_reviews.title: Quality and safe soothing product
customer_reviews.text: Wife really wanted one. Spent money on this versus the cheap versions at the home good stores. Best of all, base and touch control is high quality. Company provides extra bulb and solid warranty. Best part is when the fire hazard recall happened a year ago, the company sent me a letter and email notifying me of their product quality and testing and that they were not included in the recall. That’s solid customer support.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Defective lamp with unscrewable screws, poor designed to change bulb.
customer_reviews.text: My lamp was defective, it won't turn on, the screw in the middle was lose in the bag, it sounded like glass inside, so I assumed the bulb was broken inside. It comes with 2 replacement bulbs, so I tried to remove the screws to change it, and it was literally impossible to get the screws lose. I already initiated the return and refund. The broken bulb is understandable, but those impossible to remove screws are just a very bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids' rooms last August, 2016. The bulb is out in one of them and my spouse and I cannot, for the life of us, unscrew the four screws at the bottom of the base as directed. They are screwed on so tight that no matter how much you try, you cannot unscrew them. So disappointed. QUICK UPDATE: Levoit contacted me when I emailed them right away and they sent a replacement lamp at no charge! What wonderful customer service! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it work
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not noticed any improvement. I’m not sure if it’s in too big of a space or too far away from me but it’s the only place I can plug it in. This is the first chance I have to register my product due to not feeling well since the purchase. Not long after using it, the light stopped working. I don’t know if the bulbs died or what? I never noticed any benefits but I loved the ambience. I didn’t receive extra bulbs like others mention. I tried a plug in one too and that died even quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: This is THE lamp to buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many Natural Himalayan salt lamps, but this one stood out. One of the selling points for me was the capability of dimming the light. I love the configuration and don't think I could have done any better based on the number of lamps I looked at. It is an excellent value. It is a larger piece and when the light is on, the glow is beautiful. It is everything I hoped for.....the glow is mesmerizing. What more can I say other than I would put one in every room of the house if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS ROCK, ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: A well made high end Himalayan salt lamp indeed! Love the dimming feature. Packaging was beautiful. I dim the light ever so slightly during the night and the glow is perfect. I did not care for the side of the rock that was initially facing forward, so I unscrewed the rock and turned it around on its pedestal. Now, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wes & Laura

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged and very nice to look at, but the jury is still out as to whether they are actually beneficial to our health. Neither my father, husband or myself have noticed a marked difference in how we feel. I love that it is dimmable for sleeping though! 2/3 have completely died (AND we’ve already had to change out bulbs).
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: As of now this completely stopped working. 2nd one :(
customer_reviews.text: 06/02/19 Update: Salt lamp has stopped working. 😫 ——————- This baby is gorgeous and authentic! (Hubby licked it to prove it 🤣) Very sturdy/heavy and unlike any other I’ve seen! My first one ordered had an issue with the dim switch (fluke issue) but their support team handled it super fast and had a replacement Aurora shipped out ASAP! Great quality and awesome customer service. Will re-purchase again for friends/fam! They love mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Delanoy

customer_reviews.title: boring hunks of salt with no variations to add interest
customer_reviews.text: I already had a much cheaper lamp from Amazon but decided to "upscale" and buy 3 Levoit salt lamps. I am bringing my cheaper lamp back into my main living area. The Levoits were very disappointing considering the rave reviews and much higher price. They were "meh"; boring hunks of salt with no variations to add interest. I'll stick with the other brands. The best thing about the Levoit is the extra bulbs and pretty packaging. Not worth the high cost or the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jevaltas

customer_reviews.title: I love but I’m disappointed at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the lamp today. And overall the price point look and packaging is great. But I am disappointed that there is a large crack that goes all the way through the lamp. It may be a natural feature that honestly I wish wasn’t there or it could have happened during shipping. The shipping box was not damaged. I opened the bottom to see if the crack is all the way through the salt and it is. I did buy the additional insurance so I’m going to contact amazon and asurion to see what can be done. I love but I’m disappointed at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamp, love customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Good night light. Leave it on 24/7. Have not noticed any sleep improvement. Mine is crooked. Poor job of installing to the base. Update 12-17 Levoit customer service responded to my review and did a great job of making sure I was satisfied. They sent a replacement lamp. Kudos to customer service, Shirley, at Levoit for being responsive. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Roper2

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but is that all?
customer_reviews.text: I give it 5 stars for the way it's packed and the overall quality. It appears to be very well made, however I have been using it for a week and i don't notice any difference in my sleep, or the way I feel. I still wake up very stuffy. My girlfriend said she feels more alert when she wakes up. I think the effectiveness of the salt lamp improving one's health, may differ from person to person. It may also just be wishful thinking. Either way it looks nice. It's been recently moved into the living room. Makes a great conversation piece. Wish it had been a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great color, large and best customer service
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely stunning! Before making this purchase I did lots of research and that’s how I discovered Levoit. Rated so high and customer satisfaction was amazing. I wanted a good lamp and I am very glad I chose Levoit here. I did take a picture but it really don’t do it any justice. I also purchased Athena and wow that one is even more impressive. Both are great size and lovely coloring. I hope my review helps. I will be buying many more in the next few weeks for my office. The packing was great and the box is just lovely
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: good looking well made lamp - very pleased
customer_reviews.text: You get quite the package with this lamp. It comes in an impressive gift box, that is well supported to protect the salt block. the box by itself is impressive for a gift. The lamp, once unwrapped, doesn't look cheap, which you might accept given the modest price tag. Its very, very nice looking. I consider this lamp a perfect gift, and very handsome to view.
customer_reviews.author: KTragg

customer_reviews.title: Nice...Well, when I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 4-13-20 With minimal use the lamp has stop working. I've changed the bulb thinking that it was the problem, but same result. So after 3 years of having the product it died. Not happy and not impressed -------- I'm very impressed with the red box. It definitely has that "wow" factor. The lamp was very professionally packed and when I got it out of the packaging I was further impressed with the weight and craftsmanship. It has a wonderful glow and I'm hoping to reap the benefits of it's use.
customer_reviews.author: sms87

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted a Himalayan Salt lamp for quite some time and was delighted when I finally purchased one. The problem came into the fact that due to unforeseen circumstances I was not able to use the lamp as soon as it was delivered. When I finally was able to use the lamp it would not dim. I wrote to the seller for advice and the base was replaced! Very impressed with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: sue LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: Not the right weight-
customer_reviews.text: I bought two salt lamps and they were supposed to be 8-11 lbs, I paid for the 8-11 lb ones. I did not like the fact that they were under 5 lbs. They did have a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: Flow20

customer_reviews.title: Pink brick
customer_reviews.text: I understand every salt lamp has its’ unique shape, but “brick like” was a surprise to me. My salt lamp is a nice shade of coral pink with 3 flat sides and one nearly flat side. The beast weighs 16 lbs. so there is no problem there, just the industrial shape.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Halwax

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it's dead because I can't change the bulb! The screws are in so tight on the base that I can't loosen them - really frustrating because I love it when it works
customer_reviews.author: Penny C

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I choose this one
customer_reviews.text: My first salt lamp and I had no idea what to look for. So many different manufacturers. So I read numerous reviews and ended up with this one. I did also purchase a second one in a comparable price range. What a difference! The other lamp doesn't even compare. The construction of this lamp is first class! I'm so glad I choose this one. I will be purchasing more of this brand for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this salt lamp! Beautiful and well made & packaged. I want them all over the house. Right now I think we all need this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved mood.
customer_reviews.text: I like these very much. The light quality Definitely seems to improve my mood. I’ve ordered 5 now. One as a gift. One did arrived broken. Although that could be the fault of sloppy shipping. They are very heavy. Great light quality. Love the dimability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife last year. We both love it. It gives off a soft warm glow that is just beautiful. The on/off dimmer switch works great. The original bulb lasted us one year. My wife tried to change it and started to strip out the screw heads that hold the base to the lamp. I managed to get them all out but I contacted Levoit customer service to see if I could get replacement screws. They not only sent me replacement screws BUT a whole new base! Now that is customer service! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KCTawnya

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: It gives off a nice ambient light in a room. Do not by any means put this on a nightstand while you sleep with it on. It will dry out your eyes really bad. It does not do anything other than give off a nice light and pull moisture from the area. It certainly does not heal anything as some may claim.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: provided a nice warm glow
customer_reviews.text: **Update** After the seller, Arovast reached out, they sent me a new base for the lamp, and voila! That familiar warm glow is back in our living room. Thank you so much! I don't know that we experienced any health benefits from the lamp, but it is attractive, provided a nice warm glow, that was particularly handy for middle of the night trips to let the dogs out, or to get a drink of water. Unfortunately it only worked for a few months. Now I have a large piece of salt on a nice aluminum base with a cord that I can't bring myself to toss in the trash. Yet.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Love

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful. It is pretty heavy so that makes me think it’s authentic. My only issue is that I continually have issues using the touch button to turn it on. I’m not sure why but it’s annoying. It always turns on in the end though so it’s a small complaint.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service and product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lamp! I ordered one and wasn't happy with the appearance of a crack that ran across the front of it, so I reordered another and they sent one out without delay. The replacement was flawless, and overall the quality of this product is outstanding. The touch sensitive dimmer switch allows different light settings and the light casts a beautiful relaxing glow. Overall, I was very pleased with this purchase and would HIGHLY recommend this seller to all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second salt lamp. I don't know if the purifying claims are true but I love these lamps. We keep one on in the family room at all times and it gives the room a very comfortable ambiance. This one is much larger than our first and I like it best. Will be getting more. I have plants next to it and they seem healthier now.
customer_reviews.author: K Petty

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: After much researched, this appeared to be the best salt lamp out there. Came in a great box and even had extra light bulbs! Seemed great, until... the bulb went out after a few months. After several failed attemps, much frustration and one broken screw driver - I can't get the bottom screws out to change the bulb. They have these tiny screws in so tight that they can't be removed without stripping them. I am able-bodied man and a rock climber, to boot. Point is, I have pretty strong hands and this is a lost cause. Thanks for the extra bulbs that can't be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Duffek

customer_reviews.title: Well... I like it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have read the reviews and understand that opinions are mixed... and I can’t tell you if this is “authentic” Himalayan Salt... but what I do know is it adds a nice mellow glow to my room, providing a soothing light that isn’t obtrusive at all... I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great salt lamp recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for these salt lamps very carefully and Levoit seemed to consiatently be rated the best. I have nothing to compare it to, but I can tell this is a high quality lamp. I wish it got a little brighter but the dimmer is very nice. I have no idea about any health benefits or negative ions but it definitely is a well made and attractive lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. Walker

product_meta.title: Levoit Elora Salt Lamp, Natural Himalayan Pink Salt Rock Lamps, Night Light, Stainless Steel Base, Dimmable Touch Switch, Holiday Gift(ETL Certified, 2 Extra Original Bulbs)
product_meta.description: Size:10 poundsSpecification: Power input: 120v/60Hz Power Source: Plug in Bulbs: 15 Watt E12 Socket Incandescent Light Bulbs Package Content: 1 x Natural Himalayan Salt Lamp 1 x Patented Touch Dimmer Switch 3 x C7 15W Bulbs(one pre-installed) 1 x Xmas Gift Box 1 x User Manual & Card
feature_bullets: PERFECT GIFT CHOICE: with the delicately packed box, here is the perfect Valentine's Day gift from LEVOIT for your loved one! Certain to brighten up your mood and create a more romantic atmosphere for your room!

100% PURE & HIGHEST QUALITY HIMALAYAN SALT: professionally hand-carved Himalayan rock salt from Pakistan. We LEVOIT is the only seller with a mining certificate. When lit, the lamp radiates a warm, Amber glow, providing a calming atmosphere to help create a sense of peace and relaxation. Ideal for the center of a coffee table or desk. Great for meditation, yoga spaces, a night light, or on your bedside table

SAFER TOUCH DIMMER SWITCH (US 120V only): the top-notch and beautifully made touch dimmer switch allows you to tap and hold to easily adjust the brightness to create the perfect atmosphere and brighten your mood. The 6. 6 ft. cord is ETL certified, freeing you from a potential fire hazard

PACKAGE CONTENT: 1 gorgeous salt lamp; 2 extra original 15 watt bulbs included in the box (replacement bulbs are available for separate purchase as needed; search: “LEVOIT light bulbs”) Note: while size, Color, and shape may vary from one lamp to another owing to the natural variations in Himalayan Crystal salt weight

PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL BASE: with FDA 18/8 class-leading stainless steel and patented base design, it can control drainage and protect your furniture from moisture build-up. With ETL, FCC, CE, RoHS approved, you’ll always get a highly rated quality product.Do not wash with water or detergents. Do not immerse in any form of liquid

specifications.Included Components: Levoit Himalayan Salt Lamp Crystal Rock, 6.5 Ft UL-Listed Power Cord, 2X 15 Watt Incandescent Light Bulb, Touch Brightness Dimmable Control, Levoit Luxury Gift Box
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,068 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
